lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Wowza, what a display of skill that only Nuck Chorris could possibly possess!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Anyways, you got any more special tricks up your sleeve?

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: I've heard humans can "bust a move" by pressing [F]!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Careful though - it makes some of us prideful warriors get real mad!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Leave? Surely not - onto the next arena! Your adoring fans await!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: You can do better than that! We believe in you!
